name: Dungeon Delvers (itch) (Cyclone35Jokesays)
description: Dungeon Delvers is a Xcom style dungeon crawler. Select your quest, pick out your squad of adventurers, and enter the dungeon. The game was developed as a student project with a team of designers and programmers. The concept takes inspiration from darkest dungeon and Xcom 2. Feel free to try it out, feedback is always welcome.
